publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2498 Alasdair Allan: Barra, Scottish Calor Village of the Year Finalistâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Barra community on reaching the final of the Scottish Calor Village of the Year competition and recognises, as this competition does, the efforts of its residents and organisations to safeguard the long-term viability of local life by improving the social, economic and environmental health of the local community. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Jamie McGrigor*, Sandra White*, Mary Scanlon*, Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bashir Ahmad*
S3M-2498 Barra, Scottish Calor Village of the Year Finalist (lodged on 5 September 2008) Angela Constance*, Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Mike Pringle*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-2498 Barra, Scottish Calor Village of the Year Finalist (lodged on 5 September 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Michael Matheson*, Dave Thompson*
S3M-2498 Barra, Scottish Calor Village of the Year Finalist (lodged on 5 September 2008) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-2498 Barra, Scottish Calor Village of the Year Finalist (lodged on 5 September 2008) Gil Paterson*
